name: Super Shot Zone
description:
This game was made for the 2019 GMTK game jam. Unlike like year I only had a few hours to make a game this year, I wish I had more time!

This game is a action platform game where you have to try and defeat as many enemies as possible, only one need's to reach the end and it's game over.

Try to stay alive for as long as you can!

(This is totally not a clone of Super Crate Box) :P

Bugs

The resolution is a bit broken on Itch, try to play on full screen if you can.

Controls

Move: WASD or Arrow keys  

Shoot: E or Left mouse button

Jump: Up or Space bar 

Credits

Code, graphics, music and sound effects all made by Daniel Griffiths
